record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2483
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2483 -- (Senate - December 13, 2007)

[Page: S15577]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand S. 2483, introduced earlier today by Senator Bingaman, is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2483) to authorize certain programs and activities in the Forest Service, the Department of the Interior, and the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.
record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bill will be read for a second time on the next legislative day.
